privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.intro: Protecting your personal data is a priority. This policy explains how your data is collected and used on this site.

dataCollected.title: Data collected
dataCollected.text: This site only collects data you voluntarily provide through the contact form: name, email address, and message.

legalBasis.title: Legal basis and purposes
legalBasis.intro: Each data processing is based on a legal basis compliant with GDPR:

retention.title: Data retention
retention.text: Your data is kept for the time necessary to process your request, then deleted within a maximum of 3 years.

rights.title: Your GDPR rights
rights.text: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.deletion: Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at hello@daviani.dev.

thirdParty.title: Third-party services and processors
thirdParty.intro: This site uses third-party services for its operation. Here is the complete list with their uses and privacy policies:

dataTransfers.title: Data transfers outside the EU
dataTransfers.text: Some of our processors are located in the United States. These transfers are governed by Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission, ensuring an adequate level of protection for your data.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.intro: This site uses different types of cookies:

technical.title: Technical cookies (no consent required)
technical.text: These cookies are essential for the site to function:

thirdParty.title: Third-party cookies (with consent)
thirdParty.text: The following services may set cookies only after your explicit consent via our ConsentGate system:

cookies.noTracking: No tracking, analytics, or advertising cookies are used on this site.

intellectual.title: Intellectual property
intellectual.content: All editorial content on this site (text, images, design) is protected by copyright. Any reproduction without prior authorization is prohibited.
intellectual.code: The source code of this site is available on GitHub under the MIT license, allowing free reuse with attribution.

contact.title: Contact and complaints
contact.text: For any questions regarding your personal data or to exercise your rights, contact us:
contact.cnil: In case of unresolved complaint, you may contact the relevant data protection authority (CNIL in France).

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.subtitle: Accessibility statement
accessibility.statusDetail: This site is partially compliant with RGAA 4.1 and WCAG 2.1 AA.
accessibility.commitmentText: We are committed to making this website accessible to everyone, regardless of their abilities or the technologies they use.
accessibility.standardsText: This site aims to comply with RGAA 4.1 (French General Accessibility Reference Framework) and WCAG 2.1 level AA.
accessibility.testingText: The site is automatically tested with jest-axe and ESLint jsx-a11y on each deployment.
accessibility.contactText: If you encounter an accessibility barrier on this site, please contact us so we can address it.

help.title: Navigation Help
help.subtitle: How to navigate this site
help.keyboardText: Use Tab to move between interactive elements, Enter to activate links and buttons, and Escape to close menus.
help.skipLinkText: A skip link appears when you start navigating with the keyboard. It allows you to jump directly to the main content.
help.themeText: Toggle between light and dark mode using the sun/moon button in the header. Your preference is saved automatically.
help.languageText: Switch between French and English using the flag button in the header.
